General.Name: Site Centers Corp
General.Description: SITE Centers is an owner and manager of open-air shopping centers located in suburban, high household income communities. The Company is a self-administered and self-managed REIT operating as a fully integrated real estate company, and is publicly traded on the New York Stock Exchange under the ticker symbol SITC.
General.Address: 3300 Enterprise Parkway, Beachwood, OH, United States, 44122
